item.description:
Gente, tera um carnavalzinho neste sabado, dia 25.
Desculpe que to anunciando pouco antes do evento.

Sera na boate Kings que tem pistas de boliche e mesas de snooker entao se a festa for bem barulhenta ou meia putaria, possivelmente, poderemos jogar.

O lugar parece bem divirtido. Tem fotos aqui.

Mal posso esperar para assistir a apresentacao de Capoeira e a bateria.
Tambem, terao mulheres dancando o Samba e muitas cachacas pra quem liga sobre esse tipo de coisa... >: )

E, melhor ainda, *** Nao tem couver *** (entrada gratuita) mas tem de fazer o RSVP atraves do site da boate aqui.


O Kings fica em Back Bay entre o Prudential Center e a Berkley School of Music onde Cris cantou. Endereco no mapa. Creio que as paradas do T mais pertas sao a Hynes Station no ramo C da linha verde e a Prudential Station no ramo E tambem da linha verde.
Mais informacao do site de Kings:

IT'S GETTING HOT IN HERE!!!

This August, Kings is proud to present in the hottest month of the year, something really hot. We going to celebrate the mega event that happens February in Brazil. Carnaval!
An exotic night, in other words, a night that will bring your body to its knees.

* SPECIAL FOOD MENU (BRAZILIAN)
* SPECIAL DRINKS MADE WITH CACHAÃ‡A (PREMIUM BRAZILIAN RUM)
* DRUMMERS PRESENTATION with BatukAxe Group and Samba Dancers
* CAPOEIRA PRESENTATION with Capoeira Brasil Boston Group (Instrutor CAVEIRA)
* DJ DIDO SPIN spinning the best Brazilian, House and Hip Hop
* NO COVER CHARGE
* 21+

BATUKAXE GROUP AND SAMBA DANCERS - PHOTOS

Drumers and Samba Dancers Drumers and Samba Dancers Drumers and Samba Dancers Drumers and Samba Dancers

Dress Code in Effect / The following items are _not allowed_ at Kings:

X Work style boots
X Hooded sweatshirts
X No large Chains
X Bandanas/Doo Rags
X Sport style jerseys
X Backpacks
X No over-sized shirts
X No Sleeveless shirts

Please note, Kings staff reserve the right to search bags at any time?

Thank you for your understanding.

---

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Carnavalzinho bostoniano na boate Kings
